short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces all images on Twitter/X with a custom image

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your Twitter/X browsing experience with a touch of crypto humor, saving Ethereum one image at a time! Critics are calling this *the* most Ethereum aligned Chrome Extension.

This lightweight extension automatically replaces all images on Twitter/X with an iconic photo of Vitalik Buterin, the founder of Ethereum.

Key Features:
• Replaces all Twitter/X images with Vitalik
• Works with both timeline and enlarged images
• Functions on both Twitter.com and X.com
• Operates completely locally in your browser
• No data collection or external connections

Perfect for:
• Crypto twitter degenerates

Note: This is a fun, novelty extension created for entertainment purposes. All image replacements happen locally in your browser and can be disabled at any time by turning off the extension.

The extension is open-source and does not collect any user data or require any special permissions beyond what's needed to modify images on Twitter/X.
